hero.title: Create Custom QR Codes
hero.description: Generate unique and stylish QR codes in just a few clicks. Customize colors, add your logo, and download in your preferred format.

legal.title: Legal Notice
legal.hostAddress: 2325 3rd Street, Suite 296, San Francisco, CA 94107, United States

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Qr2code does not collect any personally identifiable data. No information is stored or shared. The service is limited to generating and downloading QR codes directly in your browser.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: This site uses only strictly necessary cookies for your session to function. No third-party cookies or analytical trackers are placed.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.description: You have the right to access, rectify and delete your data. Since no personal data is collected, these rights have no practical application.

privacy.contact: For any questions, contact me at

q1.question: Is Qr2Code really free?
q1.answer: Yes, Qr2Code is completely free to use. You can generate unlimited QR codes without any registration, payment, or hidden fees. All features are available at no cost.

q2.question: What formats can I download my QR code in?
q2.answer: You can download your QR codes in multiple formats: PNG (for images), SVG (vector format, scalable), JPEG, WebP, and PDF. Choose the format that best suits your needs.

q3.question: Can I add my logo to the QR code?
q3.answer: Yes! You can upload your logo either by providing a URL or by selecting a file from your device. The logo will be placed in the center of the QR code while maintaining its scannability.

q4.question: Do I need to create an account?
q4.answer: No account required! Qr2Code works entirely in your browser. Simply enter your text or URL, customize your QR code, and download it immediately. No registration, no email, no hassle.

q5.question: What is the maximum size for QR codes?
q5.answer: You can generate QR codes from 100px to 1000px in size. The size you choose depends on where you plan to use the QR code - smaller for digital use, larger for print materials.

step1.title: Enter Your Content
step1.description: Type any text or paste a URL you want to encode into a QR code. It can be a website link, contact information, Wi-Fi credentials, or any text.

step2.title: Customize Your Design
step2.description: Personalize your QR code with custom colors for the background, foreground, and corners. Upload your logo to make it unique and branded.

step3.title: Download & Use
step3.description: Choose your preferred format (PNG, SVG, PDF, etc.) and download your QR code instantly. Use it in your marketing materials, business cards, or anywhere you need it.
